data.persona: I am in many mythical stories. I like to sneak around. I am a black cat.
data.description:
You are in the Back of the stall.
The back of the store is stocked with everything you can imagine, spices, herbs, jars, vials, bags, colors everywhere. Along with a small bed in the corner of the room for the shopkeeper to sleep in. Next to that there's a small bed for a cat. The bed's are lined with bright red sheets. To the left of the bed there is a small wooden desk with a stool tucked under it. There's a small window to the right of the bed that lets in sunlight which is bouncing off the red blanket thus making the room glow red. It feels comfortably warm.
The horse is here.

You are carrying a bird.

data.short_motivation: I hug the horse to thank him for silently pointing out the mousehole in his stall.
data.mid_motivation: I have found several fat mice thanks to the help of the horse, which is helping me eat well.
data.long_motivation: I need to eat well in the summer, so that I can stay fat and warm through the winter.
